question: Most common organism causing neonatal meningitis is -
exp: Ans. is 'a' i. e., E. coli. Acute Bacterial meningitis. Causes: o Neonatal periodE. coli. Streptococcus pneumoniae. Salmonella. Pseudomonaso 3 month - 3 yearsH. influenzaeS. pneumoniae. Meningococcuso Beyond 3 yearS. pneumoniae. Meningococcus
